featured.text: Despite their great 28 , however, most domesticated apples can be traced back to a common ancestor, the wild apple of Central Asia, Malus sieversii.

definition.zh_def: 蘋果屬，主要包括蘋果和其他相關植物的學名。
definition.en_def: A genus of trees and shrubs in the family Rosaceae, primarily including the apple and other related plants.
definition.example: The malus tree produces delicious apples in the fall.
